title: Healthy Ep. 16 - How to Talk About Your Faith with Greg Koukl
description:
How do we talk about Jesus? This episode will encourage you and challenge you.

Find Greg's book Tactics here: https://www.amazon.com/Tactics-10th-Anniversary-Discussing-Convictions/dp/0310101468
